nodes.text: Krex Alto was a mercenary hired by Zelto Sliteye. Alto was contracted to kill Imperial Precipitator Minas-Coth Cray at Ord Mynock Freeport.

Krex Alto was a mercenary and assassin for hire, selling their services to the highest bidder. During the Galactic Civil War, Alto was contracted by the crime lord Zelto Sliteye at the Ord Mynock Freeport. Sliteye wanted Imperial Precipitator Minas-Coth Cray dead to send a message to the Empire that Ord Mynock Freeport was his to rule.
Alto was a careful planner, and did not like to let his employer down. The mercenary planned to make the assassination of Cray untraceable so that no blame would fall on Sliteye.

Alto wore bounty hunter armor, and was armed with a heavy blaster pistol, a grenade launcher, and a vibroblade. The mercenary also carried a medpac, two fragmentation grenades, and a flash-bang grenade.
